Pay your council tax bill online or set up a payment plan.

Pay now online

You can pay your council tax online using a debit card.

Pay online through My Gloucester

You'll need your council tax account reference number, which is on your bill.

Set up Direct Debit

Direct Debit is the easiest way to pay. Your payments are taken automatically each month, so you'll never miss a payment.

Why use Direct Debit

  • Automatic payments - no need to remember
  • Never miss a payment
  • Protected by the Direct Debit Guarantee

How to set up Direct Debit

You can set up a Direct Debit through your My Gloucester account or download a form.

Set up Direct Debit online

Payment schedule

Council tax is paid over 10 monthly payments from April to January.

Problems paying?

If you're struggling to pay your council tax, contact us before you fall behind. It's easier to help if you get in touch early.

We can help with:

  • Setting up a payment arrangement
  • Checking if you qualify for Council Tax Support
  • Advice on budgeting and other support services

Get help with payments

Quick tip

Set up Direct Debit to pay automatically each month. You'll never miss a payment.
